attributes.action: increase the criteria to which citezens are entitled to free legal aid to include the means tested benefits  of housing benefit and council tax benefit as the current system only allows for those on income support and income based JSA.  This means that many people out there on the breadline are left having to contribute large sums of money in order to get legal assistance that they should be entitled to free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if you arent on income support or income based JSA you are left running the gauntlet trying to get legal aid in many cases people who are already on the breadline are then expected to contribute large sums of cash in order for them to receive legal assistance.  This assistance should be providede to all who are in receipt of ANY means tested benefit and not be limited to just those on the above benefits.
